```{r}
library(magrittr)
library(data.table)
library(gt)
```


## Education

```{r}
edu <- fread("data/education.csv")

edu[order(-end_date)] %>% .[language=="en", .(years = paste0(end_date %>% year()), what = paste0("**", what, "**, ", institute))] %>%
  gt() %>% 
   fmt_markdown(columns = everything()) %>% 
  tab_options(
    table.width = pct(100),
    column_labels.hidden = TRUE,
    table.border.top.style = "hidden",
    table_body.hlines.style =  "hidden",
    table_body.border.bottom.style = "hidden"
  ) %>% 
   cols_width(
    years ~ px(120)
) %>% 
  cols_align(
    align = c("left"),
    columns = everything()
)
```

## Current work

```{r}

a <- data.table(years = 2023, what = '**Researcher, [Psychosocial factors and health - study group](https://www.helsinki.fi/en/researchgroups/psychosocial-factors-and-health)**', where = 'Department of Psychology and Logopedics, Faculty of Medicine, University of Helsinki.')

b <- data.table(years = 2023, what = '**Researcher, [Out of Despair](https://ulosepatoivosta.fi/en/) - study**', where = '[Social Psychiatry](https://www.tuni.fi/en/about-us/social-psychiatry), Faculty of Social Sciences, Tampere university')

c <- data.table(years = 2023, what = '**Consultant psychiatrist**', where = '[Psykiatrikonsultaatiot Hilla Oy](https://www.hillaoy.fi)')

d <- data.table(years = 2019, what = '**Project Worker at the [Finnish Psychiatric Association](https://www.psy.fi/in_english)**', where = 'Member at the [Finnish Quality of Psychosis Care Register](https://repo.thl.fi/sites/laaturekisterit/psykoosienhoidonrekisteri.html) -team at the [National quality registers in healthcare and socialservices](https://thl.fi/fi/web/sote-palvelujen-johtaminen/arviointi-ja-seuranta/sote-tietopohja/terveydenhuollon-kansalliset-laaturekisterit/kansallisten-laaturekisterien-raportit) -project at the [Finnish Institute for Health and Welfare (THL)](https://thl.fi/en/web/thlfi-en)')

rbindlist(list(a, b, c, d), idcol = "item") %>% .[,.(years = paste0(years, " ->"), what =paste0(what, " <br> ", where))] %>% 
  gt() %>% 
   fmt_markdown(columns = everything()) %>% 
  tab_options(
    table.width = pct(100),
    column_labels.hidden = TRUE,
    table.border.top.style = "hidden",
    table_body.hlines.style =  "hidden",
    table_body.border.bottom.style = "hidden"
  ) %>% 
   cols_width(
    years ~ px(120)
) %>% 
  cols_align(
    align = c("left"),
    columns = everything()
) %>% 
    tab_style(
    style = "vertical-align:top",
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = years
      )
  ) 
```
